row.description: You can now comment on feed items and reviews. Keep an eye out for the icon.
row.title: Comments!

row.description: You'll now see new feed items and notifications load in realtime without refreshing the page.
row.title: Realtime updates

row.description: Phase one of lists is ready, create your own custom lists like "Favorite Christmas Movies". The lists feature will become more robust over the next few weeks.
row.title: Create and share custom lists
